DOC.brief_summary: To compare efficacy global postural reeducation ( GPR ) static stretching exercise ( SS ) treatment woman temporomandibular disorder ( TMD ) . Physical therapy importance treatment myogenic temporomandibular disorder ( TMD ) . Both stretch exercise global posture reeducation equally effective treatment TMD .
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : To compare efficacy global postural reeducation ( GPR ) static stretching exercise ( SS ) treatment woman temporomandibular disorder ( TMD ) . Methods : A total 24 subject TMD randomize two treatment group : GPR , therapy involve muscle global chain stretching , SS , conventional static stretching . Eight treatment session last 40 minute ( weekly ) perform . Assessments conduct baseline , immediately treatment end , two month later . Measurements include pain intensity temporomandibular joint , headache , cervicalgia ( visual analogue scale - VAS ) teeth clench . Additionally , electromyographic activity pain threshold measure masseter , anterior temporalis , sternocleidomastoid , upper trapezius muscle . Two-way analysis variance ( ANOVA ) Tukey post-hoc test use in-between group comparison . Significance level 0.05 .
DOC.criteria: Helkimo index III , Myogenic TMD , AND Presence parafunctional habit , : bruxism , teeth clenching , mouthbreathing lip biting . Surgery trauma orofacial region , Systemic degenerative disease , OR Undergoing odontological , psychological , physical therapy treatment .
